While parts of Africa, the Middle East, and southern Europe will witness totality, most of the world will see only a partial eclipse or no change at all. The Moon's shadow is too narrow to darken the entire planet simultaneously.

title: Brazilian volleyball star Julia Azevedo survives back gunshot in Rio attack
description: Brazilian volleyball player Julia Rocha Marques de Azevedo, 28, survived a shooting attempt in Rio de Janeiro after being shot in the back. The bullet narrowly missed her spine and bladder, with doctors stating she was lucky to be alive. Azevedo, who feels 'born again,' is recovering at home and aims to return to volleyball within a month.

Suffering from depression for two months, Pabari was found hanging by his wife. This incident occurred exactly one year after a rape complaint was filed against him by his former fiancée.

AI spending race: Mark Cuban warns Perplexity, OpenAI, Google; only one will win
description: Mark Cuban has cautioned major AI firms like OpenAI and Google against excessive spending in the race for the most powerful models. He likens the current AI arms race to the 1990s search engine boom, predicting a potential bubble and winner-take-all outcome. Cuban believes true disruption will emerge from unexpected breakthroughs, not just incremental improvements.

title: Google chips threaten Nvidia: Stock drops $250B; claims 'we lead industry'
description: Nvidia's dominance in AI chips faced a significant challenge as Meta reportedly considers billions in spending on Google's competing AI processors. This news sent Nvidia's stock plummeting, while Alphabet's shares climbed. Google's TPUs are emerging as a credible alternative, potentially disrupting Nvidia's market hold.

title: Ayesha Curry shares heartfelt note for Stephen days after marriage controversy
description: Ayesha Curry posted a heartwarming message for her husband Stephen Curry's new book, "Shot Ready," amidst recent online backlash. She had previously expressed on a podcast that she didn't initially want marriage or children, leading to fan outrage and accusations of disrespecting her husband.

title: Charlie McAvoy faces heartbreaking week as wife Kiley shares emotional update
description: Boston Bruins defenseman Charlie McAvoy is going through a devastating week. As his wife Kiley McAvoy revealed an emotional family update on social media. With Charlie already recovering from recent jaw surgery. The couple is now facing additional personal challenges involving their young son.
